name: Starburn 64
description:
STARBURN 64

In a.d. 2101
you were on your mission to inspect abnormal activity near the star [[solar]]. 

Everything looked good until you heard an unpleasant bang. somehow your massdrive fried itself.

now you are stuck looping around the orbit of the star. Far to close to the surface....-

---

INFO: Having trouble with the mouse sensitivity? Use n and m keys to decrease or increase the sensitivity!

---

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 (Compo). The game and its assets were created by myself. 

As by the rules, source code is included. If you want to play around with it, make sure to use the Mono version of Godot (I've used C#)
